oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Alabama Farmers Union Meetings Flyer
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Flyer for meetings about farmer's issues in rural communities in Alabama. Issues discussed include rural telephones, homes for farmers, rural medical care, and a new mill cooperative. Speakers are Flossie Harris from National Farmers Union and J.D. Mott from the Alabama Farmers Union. Zilphia Horton will lead singing. Communities listed are Coat's Bend, Hokes Bluff, Agricola, Hardin, Howell's, Oneonta, and Altoona.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Rural telephone; Rural conditions; Rural health services; National Farmers' Union (U.S.); Agriculture, Cooperative; Labor union meetings
